title: New: Liyv – Feeling Like Me
body:
Seattle’s **Liyv** is my favourite alt-pop rising star right now – with her gradually building collection of tracks showcasing a colourful array of emotionally connected songwriting.

Her latest, _Feeling Like Me_ is less immediate, but no less affecting than her previous releases – again tackling issues surrounding building self-esteem and self-worth. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
